data.title: Avant Browser Ultimate Portable
data.meta_description: Avant Browser Ultimate Portable, free download for Windows. Portable program that allows users to access and browse the Internet without the need for installation on their PC.
data.text:
A browser powered by multiple cores: Firefox, IE and Chrome.

Avant Browser Ultimate (Portable Edition) is a feature-packed web browser which is powered by all three of the main browser engines, namely those from Firefox, Internet Explorer and Google Chrome.

The main advantage of this particular program is the fact that it is portable and does not require installation, perhaps making it a good addition to any webmaster's tool belt. Apart from that, it's a pretty minimalist-looking browser.

Under the hood though is where Avant's features can be found. The settings menu seems to be more extensive than most browsers, mainly because of the built-in options available such as online bookmarking, in-page video downloading, HTML-to-text, private browsing and more.

Avant Browser Ultimate Portable may best be described as a browser which has all of the most popular plugins and addons already built in.

Worth mentioning about Avant Browser Ultimate Portable is that it seems pretty fast and uses little CPU and memory resources.

Overall, Avant Browser Ultimate can be useful to some users and gives users the option to render webpages as the three other major browsers would.

Features of Avant Browser Ultimate Portable

Ad-blocker: Blocks intrusive advertisements to provide a cleaner and more enjoyable browsing experience.

Auto-fill forms: Automatically fills in website forms with saved information, saving you time and effort.

Built-in password manager: Safely stores and manages your website passwords for convenient login.

Customizable interface: Provides options to personalize the browser's appearance and layout to suit your preferences.

Customizable mouse and keyboard shortcuts: Enables you to assign shortcuts for quick access to various browser functions.

Download manager: Manages your downloads, allowing you to pause, resume and organize files with ease.

Fast and efficient browsing: Offers a speedy and efficient browsing experience for improved productivity.

Low system resource usage: Optimizes resource utilization to minimize system slowdowns and maximize performance.

Mouse gestures: Enables you to perform various actions by simply moving your mouse in predefined patterns.

Multi-engine support: Supports multiple rendering engines, including Trident, Gecko and Webkit, for enhanced compatibility.

Online storage integration: Integrates with popular online storage services, enabling easy file uploading and sharing.

Privacy and security features: Offers features such as private browsing mode and anti-phishing protection to safeguard your online activities.

RSS reader: Allows you to subscribe to and read RSS feeds directly within the browser.

Split view and dual rendering: Lets you view multiple webpages side by side and render them with different engines for comparison.

Tabbed browsing: Allows you to open and manage multiple webpages in separate tabs for easy navigation.

Compatibility and License

Avant Browser Ultimate Portable is provided under a freeware license on Windows from web browsers with no restrictions on usage. Download and installation of this PC software is free and 2020.3 is the latest version last time we checked.

Avant Force accepts donations for the continued development of this free software.

What version of Windows can Avant Browser Ultimate Portable run on?

Avant Browser Ultimate Portable can be used on a computer running Windows 11 or Windows 10. Previous versions of the OS shouldn't be a problem with Windows 8 and Windows 7 having been tested. It comes in both 32-bit and 64-bit downloads.
